3: Not a Corrupted. Who are you?
Yeah. Back on the train, Jamilah once bought some for the children who lost their families.
Take me... to my master's child... I can... give you directions...
You're lacking vital fluid. You need a refill.
Looks like there's a shop up ahead. We should check and see if there are any supplies.
There are the toys... Could the child be here?
I don't sense any human life signs. I'll check again.
According to the records, this caretaker android prototype is highly realistic and programed to complete regular emotional companionship tasks.
There was a recorded case on the Engine where the android continued to drain its energy source if the assigned tasks were unfulfilled.
What are we waiting for, then? Let's go!
